Content: 10th anniversary of the 58 Division Headquarters in Boossa - Galle, was marked on Thursday (3) giving priority to military traditions. Major General Sudath Perera, General Officer Commanding (GOC) of the 58 Division on arrival was greeted to a Guard Turnout plus a parade presented by under command troops in the Division. An all rank lunch brought the morning programme to an end. On Friday (4), all troops at the Division Headquarters enjoyed the evening in a musical show to coincide with the anniversary. Prior to the anniversary day, a Bodhi Pooja at the Divisional premises and a Pooja at the Seenigama Devala premises invoked blessings on the anniversary.
